name: CiviCRM Contribution Page Widget
author: AGH Strategies, LLC

sections.description:
CiviCRM contribution pages allow you to generate a “widget” showing the progress toward a goal. This plugin makes it easy to include one or more contribution page “widgets” as actual WordPress widgets on your sidebar.

This plugin requires CiviCRM 4.3 or higher.

Read more at http://aghstrategies.com/civicontribute-widget
sections.installation:
1. Upload civicontribute-widget to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to the ‘Widgets’ page in WordPress to add and configure one or more widgets.

short_description: Displays contribution page widgets from CiviContribute as native WordPress widgets.
